channel.title: Wtf please help my ring of stone is being hans'y! please look!

item.title: Wtf please help my ring of stone is being hans'y! please look!
item.dc:creator: @owndscape owndscape
item.description:
@owndscape wrote:

Rofl this is simple most the tuts don’t know this so if you leeched it you probably did it wrong here is my code for ring of stone.
under public boolean wearif (wearID == 6583) { // ring of stone EntangleDelay = 10000; npcId = 2626; npcId2 = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
and then under public void removeif (wearID == 6583) { isNpc = false; }
Also if I was you i would put a sM(“You turn into Stone”); and sM(“Your Human again but feel heavier”);

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf please help my ring of stone is being hans'y! please look!
item.dc:creator: @DemisePking DemisePking
item.description:
@DemisePking wrote:

Ive added this code to make it so my ring of stone turns me into some rocks, but it just turns me into hans. I think this is because its not recognising the npcId and just turning me into npc no 0, which is hans

Anyone know how i can make it identify the npc?

CODE

}
if (wearID == 6583) { // ring of stone
EntangleDelay = 1000000000;
npcId = 2626;
isNpc = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Read full topic
